text: Hello! Is there a way to copy email sections as hubl, similar to how you can copy sections in landing pages as hubl while in developer Mode? That would save me a lot of time right now.

Hi Team,
We have a requirement  to create a new campaign and send traceable url in WhatsApp messages to the contacts. When we send links to people, we need to create a dashboard which captures the data ,
1. who clicks on them
2.  how many times the user have clicked,
3. Campaign send to which contacts,
4.  which contact have received which campaign
The links will look like this:

`<https://example.com?prospect_id=123456&utm_source=whatsapp&utm_medium=message&utm_campaign=trstwhatsapp>`
fyi <@U085PUM5LTF>
